name: UpdateOpsgenieService
description:
Update a service in the Datadog Opsgenie integration.

This tool updates a specified service object within the Datadog Opsgenie integration. It should be called when you need to modify an existing Opsgenie service.

parameters.name: service_uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the service to be updated in the Datadog Opsgenie integration.

parameters.name: opsgenie_service_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Opsgenie service to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Opsgenie service.

parameters.name: opsgenie_service_resource_type
parameters.description: Specify as 'opsgenie-service' to denote the Opsgenie service resource type.

parameters.name: custom_region_url
parameters.description: The custom URL for a specific Opsgenie region. Specify if using a custom region.

value_schema.description: The custom URL for a custom region.

parameters.name: opsgenie_service_name
parameters.description: The name for the Opsgenie service to update. It should uniquely identify the service within your Opsgenie account.

value_schema.description: The name for the Opsgenie service.

parameters.name: opsgenie_api_key
parameters.description: The API key for your Opsgenie service, needed to authenticate the update request.

value_schema.description: The Opsgenie API key for your Opsgenie service.

parameters.name: opsgenie_service_region
parameters.description: Specify the region for the Opsgenie service. Allowed values are 'us', 'eu', or 'custom'.

value_schema.description: The region for the Opsgenie service.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.custom_url
parameters.description: The custom URL for a custom region.

value_schema.description: The custom URL for a custom region.

parameters.name: data.attributes.name
parameters.description: The name for the Opsgenie service.

value_schema.description: The name for the Opsgenie service.

parameters.name: data.attributes.opsgenie_api_key
parameters.description: The Opsgenie API key for your Opsgenie service.

value_schema.description: The Opsgenie API key for your Opsgenie service.

parameters.name: data.attributes.region
parameters.description: The region for the Opsgenie service.

value_schema.description: The region for the Opsgenie service.

parameters.name: data.id
parameters.description: The ID of the Opsgenie service.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Opsgenie service.
